content:
I'm glad you liked "The Last Dance"!

As for the English Premier League schedule, I can definitely help you with that! The Premier League season is currently underway, and there are plenty of exciting matches lined up for this month.

You can find the full schedule on the official Premier League website or on various sports websites and apps. However, I can give you a brief overview of the upcoming matches for the next few weeks:

* This week (Week 10):
	+ Friday, November 5: Southampton vs. Newcastle United (3:00 PM ET)
	+ Saturday, November 6: Multiple matches, including Chelsea vs. Burnley (10:00 AM ET) and Manchester City vs. Fulham (12:30 PM ET)
	+ Sunday, November 7: Liverpool vs. West Ham United (11:30 AM ET)
* Week 11 (November 20-22):
	+ Multiple matches, including Arsenal vs. Liverpool (12:30 PM ET) and Chelsea vs. Leicester City (3:00 PM ET)
* Week 12 (November 27-29):
	+ Multiple matches, including Manchester United vs. Chelsea (12:30 PM ET) and Liverpool vs. Southampton (3:00 PM ET)

Please note that the schedule is subject to change, and you should check the official Premier League website or your local TV listings for the most up-to-date information.

If you have a specific team you're interested in, I can try to provide more detailed information about their upcoming matches.
